text: @Haggis_UK @piersmorgan @UKinIndia Has given below guidance 👉You will not be able to travel if you are currently showing coronavirus symptoms (you will need to self-isolate and travel later). There will be mandatory healthcare screening at the airport. You should comply with any additional screening
